scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:install
scripts.setup:install: npm run setup:install:web && npm run setup:install:server
scripts.setup:install:server: cd server && python3 -m venv env && . ./env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python -m unidic download && deactivate
scripts.dev: npm run server:dev & npm run web:dev
scripts.format: npm run format:web && npm run format:server
